targets.query: SELECT str( last("parameterVersionMainBoard")) FROM "sensors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("pelletsAnfangsStand") FROM "sensors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pelletsBehaelterKG") FROM "sensors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("parameterFeedRateTotal") FROM "sensors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (last("pelletsAnfangsStand")-last("parameterFeedRateTotal")+last("pelletsBehaelterKG")) FROM "sensors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(4w)
SELECT (last("parameterFeedRateTotal")-last("pelletsAnfangsStand")) FROM "sensors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(4w) fill(null)
SELECT last("outputIgnition")*10 FROM "sensors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
